amendment.description: Amendment deleted language which changed the name of the National Science Foundation to the National Science and Engineering Foundation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 131 of the bill which renames the National Science Foundation and the National Science Board as the National Science and Engineering Foundation and the National Science and Engineering Board.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ehlers amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 339 - 58, 1 Present (Roll no. 198).
